title: Explained: What is 'long COVID' — how is vaccination expected to affect such patients? - Gaonconnection | Your Connection with Rural India - Gaon Connection English
description: Recovery from COVID19 can be exceptionally delayed in many patients. Some cases even take months to heal completely. A new study explains the link between vaccination and the phenomenon commonly referred to as ‘long COVID’.

author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
title: COVID nails could be a sign that you have had COVID: Here's how to identify it - Times of India
description: Our nails can hold a lot of clues about how well and healthy we are. We tell you what 'COVID' nails are, and how exactly you can spot it
content: COVID nails, according to case studies, can come up weeks or months after fighting the virus. It can not just affect the nail bed but appear on the toes as well. However, the most characteristic mark… [+458 chars]

title: "Suppression And Manipulation": Priyanka Gandhi Accuses Centre On Covid Data - NDTV
description: Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi Vadra on Monday accused the Centre of suppressing data related to the Covid pandemic, and said the PM Modi government's emphasis on propaganda over saving lives had caused "immense damage".
content:
Congress has been critical of the Centre's handling of the Covid situation in the country.

author: Times Now Digital
title: Andhra Pradesh extends curfew till June 20 to contain COVID; relaxations given from 6 am to 2 pm [GUIDELINES] - Times Now
description: The Andhra Pradesh government on Monday announced that the ongoing COVID-induced curfew will be extended till June 20.
content:
• Government offices would function from 8 am to 2 pm daily till June 20
  • COVID positivity rate in Andhra Pradesh fell from a high of 25% in mid-May to about 10%
